subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller finished second to Jean-Baptiste Grange by 0.79 of a second Sunday in the World Cup slalom opener in Levi, Finland, spoiling what could have been a perfect weekend for American slalom skiers. Lindsey Vonn, who captured the women’s overall title last season, won the opening slalom Saturday.
